description:
Provide Support, LLC (New York, US) http://www.providesupport.com, a global provider of Live Chat software and Real-Time Website Monitoring solutions is looking to hire developers experienced with Facebook API, Google+ API or Twitter API integration. 

Requirements: 
 - Previous experience with Facebook API, Google+ API or Twitter API integration. 
 - Higher education. 
 - Knowledge of English language to freely read and write technical documentation. 

Conditions: 
 - Remote contract job with relatively flexible schedule. 
 - Long term working relationship. 
 - Full time (about 120...160 hours per month). 
 - Hourly rate payment (based on the quality of your service).
name: Developer for Facebook API, Google+ API or Twitter API integration is needed for remote contract job
